title: Weather: Strong winds may reduce Auckland Harbour Bridge lanes, MetService forecasts cold and windy weather for Saturday
transTitle: 天气：大风可能会减少奥克兰海港大桥的车道，MetService 预计周六会有寒冷多风的天气

title: Pūteketeke returned to the wild after surgery to remove fishhook
transTitle: 普特克特克在接受鱼钩手术后返回野外

title: Police following 'strong lines of enquiry' in Khandallah death investigation
transTitle: 警方在坎德拉死亡调查中进行“强有力的调查”

title: Man charged with murder of Palmerston North man
transTitle: 男子被控谋杀北帕默斯顿男子

title: Air New Zealand flight forced to divert to Guam due to ‘electrical smell’ on plane
transTitle: 新西兰航空一航班因机上“有电味”被迫备降关岛

title: Strong wind warnings for central New Zealand, flights disrupted
transTitle: 新西兰中部强风警告，航班中断

title: Napier Megafish: Four men rescued from sinking boat after hitting log
transTitle: 纳皮尔巨型鱼：四名男子在击中圆木后从沉船中获救

title: Nearly 1000 fur seals found dead in Kaikōura in five months
transTitle: 五个月内凯库拉发现近 1000 只海狗死亡

title: Flights disrupted, strong wind warnings lifted
transTitle: 航班中断，强风警告解除
